task.title: How to install a TEI framework with the Latest Schema and Stylesheets
task.shortdesc: How to install a TEI framework with the latest version of TEI Schema and Stylesheets.

context.p: The TEI framework bundled into has the TEI Schema and Stylesheets that were available at the time of its release. The TEI Consortium releases a new TEI version (Schema and Stylesheets), they also release a new version of the TEI framework with them.
context.note: TEI Consortium, who maintains these releases, chose to keep them compatible with version 18.1. This means certain some improvements developed in later versions of might be missing from these frameworks.
context.p: The following procedure describes how to install a release of the TEI framework done by TEI Consortium, one that has a newer version of TEI Schema and TEI XSL:

step.cmd: Go to Help Install new add-ons .
In the displayed dialog box, paste the update site.
Choose the TEI framework that you want to install, click the Next button, then follow the on-screen instructions.
